title: Digital Science Education Design Workshop: Smartphone-Based Collaborative Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: A course aiming to strengthen digital science education design capabilities in smartphone-centric restricted technology environments. Cultivates collaborative e-learning tool competencies applicable to authentic science education scenarios

learning_goals: Improvement in designing digital content production processes for science education using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Cultivation of the ability to establish project improvement plans through peer feedback systems.
Development of a science experiment simulation web platform prototype applicable in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
